Class StaticVirtualScreenInitializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • it.polito.computervision.virtualscreen.AbstractVirtualScreenInitializer
        • it.polito.computervision.virtualscreen.impl.StaticVirtualScreenInitializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.primesense.nite.HandTracker.NewFrameListener, VirtualScreenInitializer, java.lang.Runnable

    public class StaticVirtualScreenInitializer
extends AbstractVirtualScreenInitializer
implements com.primesense.nite.HandTracker.NewFrameListener
    A simple VirtualScreenInitializer that initializes the VirtualScreen in a fixed position.
    Author:
    giovanni
